question: In 2011, ONGC discovered India’s first shale gas reserve in which among the following states?
explanation: In January 2011,India’s biggest energy explorer Oil & Natural Gas Corporation ONGC has discovered the country’s first shale gas reserve at Durgapur in Burdwan district of West Bengal. The gas reserve spread over 12,000 square km in the Durgapur-Ranigunj area – is the world’s third shale gas find
